website_summaries.verdict: A mid-priced option that features solid construction, a great look, and several different configuration options.
pros: Fast assembly, usually in under half an hour
The cutting board is solid wood, and the unit overall is sturdy and stable
Comes in a variety of configurations
cons: Plastic clips used to put it together need to be positioned pointing in the right direction for the assembly to work correctly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I bought two of these
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I bought two of these. One originally for a shipping station and I happened to use it for my printers and scanners and extra storage. I liked the idea so much that I bought two of them. I did purchase an extra shelf for each of these being that it only has two shelves. So I could get extra storage for my printer paper and shipping labels. I also purchased wire baskets to hold small items that I use all the time. I also purchased some storage bins to store odds and ends. Plus I went and purchased caster wheels from the hardware store so I could roll both around with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: wish i would have bought it years ago
customer_reviews.text: i love this rack. we put it together and noticed all the space in between the two shelves. i ordered an extra shelf and it was perfect. it really should come with three. i've had nothing but compliments on it. for the first time in years, i have room in my cabinets. it really holds a lot. if my kitchen was just a little longer, i would purchase another one. unless u have to store really tall items, order the extra shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgetgirl

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more relieved and satisfied with this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace another kitchen storage solution that had completely fallen apart after a couple of years. I was slightly concerned that this item would have the same fate, and look cheap, as it cost less than half of what I paid for the item it was to replace. Couldn't be more relieved and satisfied with this! It's super sturdy (and I think will stay that way), looks great, and was easy to put together. It's able to hold all of our pots and pans on the shelves, and the hanging rack holds a six-piece cooking utensil set, plus 4 measuring cups (had to buy some more hooks from Lowes), with some room to spare. TLDR: Love it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Not a good sign when you are ordering jb weld before you are done assembling
customer_reviews.text: Came broken see pic. Description said solid maple. It's pressboard with like a shelf paper on it that looks like real wood. You can see it's pressboard in the pic. No durability, came with small tear already in the "shelf paper". Even dropped down to 84 dollars it's overpriced. -1 star for being broken -1 for not as described and - 1 for value
customer_reviews.author: Mysticclam

customer_reviews.title: Quality is sub-par at best
customer_reviews.text: We needed a rack that fit a specific corner of our apartment and could house both the microwave and toaster oven. The specs and design on this were perfect for that, however design and execution left something to be desired. Bars of metal came bent (not rendering the rack unusable, but still indicative of quality), and the shelf is incredibly wobbly. It will be more of a pain to return this than to just deal with it over the course of our apartment lease.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this cart.
customer_reviews.text: We like almost everything about this cart. We are glad we purchased it. There are many of our larger counter top appliances on it. Rolls wonderful from family room to kitchen to use our broiler oven on the top solid shelf. The only thing we do not alike about is when we lift up the handle to get it over the bump to get into the kitchen, the handle lifts up on the post, so I have to lift it up with the posts, and not the handle, but it works so no major complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Little

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the Honey-Can-Do rolling cart. I needed more storage and after considerable searching around on Amazon for a kitchen cart I chose this one. Assembly was not difficult once I figured out how to do it. The cart rolls well and holds what I need it to hold. It is sturdy enough for me. The metal parts are stamped NSF. I have a Boos kitchen cart which is larger and sturdier than the Honey-Can-Do cart. However the Boos cart cost five times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Cranky Old Woman

customer_reviews.title: Composite wood, not "solid maple"
customer_reviews.text: The description of this product reads "Features solid maple cutting surface and bonus rail for holding spices" and for that reason I chose this product over its many competitors. Instead, this is composite wood, and with no other details provided, it is not even clear to me that it is food-safe (manufactured with food-safe resins), despite what the products reference as a "cutting surface" would imply. As I intended to use it for just that, this is quite disappointing. I suspect that the first time a knife touches the thin, soft surface it will scratch, though I am hesitant to verify that until I have decided whether it is worth the hassle to return this misleading product.
customer_reviews.author: Lm.c

customer_reviews.title: Good for small appliances
customer_reviews.text: The item had nothing to really rave about. It appeared to be easy to assemble but it was somewhat difficult placing the black pieces around the poles to secure the shelves. They kept coming off when I tried to place the shelves on. I imagined it to be taller. Idk why, but I did. It was too low for my microwave so I placed my toaster oven on it. Its serving it's purpose in that regard.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci

customer_reviews.title: Cheap MDF wood with a plastic wood colored wrap!
customer_reviews.text: Had read earlier reviews bashing the item but later ones suggesting the wooden work surface was now "solid maple" (as erroneously stated in the seller's description) and appropriate as a cutting board work surface. It's a thin coat of plastic over mdf and the first time I tried to lift it to adjust the surface height on the poles the screws holding the board pulled right out of the mdf. It is a cheap piece of junk with super thin gauge wiring and false advertising to boot! It will be going back!
customer_reviews.author: Betsy K.

customer_reviews.title: "Solid" maple wood shelf is pressed board, not durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shelf to store overflow kitchen appliances. Received shipment and noted immediately that top shelf was not, in fact, solid maple but was cheap chipped wood product. Very dissatisfied! Unfortunately, I attempted to return this product 1 day after my 30 day return window closed. Very frustrated with myself for missing the window and VERY frustrated with this product. Would have rated it slightly above average if not falsely advertised. Now I. have more clutter in the garage waiting for "Got Junk" service, and I threw ~$80 away needlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Sprout

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Product is even better than pictured. Very easy to assembly, and very sturdy once together. We purchased this item for our daughter's apartment. She has a very small kitchen, and this fit perfectly into the space for which we purchased the rack. We were able to store a lot of items on it. This helped her free up valuable cabinet space. It was sturdy enough for us to place glass items on the very top of the rack. She loved that she could hang items with the hooks provided. I would highly recommend this rack. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: hoffa

customer_reviews.title: Good quality overall, but a little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but it's definitely not the most sturdy rack in the world. We have the microwave on the wood shelf and when I open and close the microwave door, I have to hold the it so the whole rack doesn't wobble. It's never caused a problem for me though, so I would buy again. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Arrived fast-looks sleek!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rack!! It's our new "coffee spot" and it looks great! <shipment arrived fast!!>
customer_reviews.author: MaZen

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be used...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this yesterday and waited until today to assemble it. As I struggled to open the box, I realized it was hot glued together...okay. I've assembled these types of bakers' racks before, so I was familiar with the things that help keep it anchored in place. It still was quite the task, I couldn't get them to slide over the metal. However, even though all parts were in the box, a few pieces were attached and broken off...I don't mid if I'm getting an open box product, but at least tell me and discount the price! I shouldn't have to pay full price for a returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: okay, not the best
customer_reviews.text: wasnt as sturdy as it could have been, but easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tamela callander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Apartment or Smaller Space
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little bakers rack for apartment living. I was looking for something no bigger than 24 inches and this is it. It fits perfect against the oven/stove and gives the overall kitchen a more finished and polished look. The glider drawer is a nice touch too. I do wish it came with a least one or two S hooks though.
customer_reviews.author: Fiakay

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and not safe
customer_reviews.text: Very unstable. Can not open microwave with out this almost falling over. Definitely safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Solid Maple
customer_reviews.text: We have some other wire shelves by this brand and they work just fine for what we need. I was debating between 2 different microwave carts and would have chosen the other one had I known this was not solid maple. Some of the other reivews mentioned this but I didn't read them prior to purchasing. The laminate particle board faux wood shelf looks very cheap. Overall it functions ok and is sturdy enough though now that we've been using it it definitely is more wobbly than we'd like. We would NOT purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Addition
customer_reviews.text: We were running out of cabinet space fast and wanted an affordable solution to store our larger kitchen appliance. This has been absolutely perfect for that. The assembly was a bit tricky when it came to making your legs and shelves level, but once that was straightened out (pun intended?), everything else fell right into place. It might look initially like just a bunch of metal shelves, but once it's full, the look completely transforms! Also, definitely look at getting additional hooks. They ones that come with it are on the tinier side, really only good for mugs or cups with a handle. They don't work on pots and pans because the actual bend in the hook is too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Serpa

customer_reviews.title: Love or Hate
customer_reviews.text: It serves our purpose for now. We have limited space so got this to set up coffee station, stand mixer etc. It is not a sturdy stand though. The upper part does not stand straight even when it is not holding any utensils. The slanting part of the stand strips away the classy look of the stand. But despite these flaws it does work great to hold our necessary appliances, fruit bowl etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: We put this together in about 10 minutes and looks good. Could be a tad more less flimsy, but it’s not bad once it’s up against the wall and people aren’t moving it around. Opened up our kitchen and made it feel less crowded than my cabinet I had.
customer_reviews.author: Heather P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a small pantry room near my kitchen. Sturdy construction and holds all my baking equipment and supplies. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for laundry area
customer_reviews.text: Has locking wheels only on one side. Need 2 people to assemble as it is wobbly while trying to put together. Top is a plastic resin wood look.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coffee station
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly in my apartment which has limited counter space in the kitchen. Price is pretty high but pieces appear to be good quality. The second shelf beneath the counter surface pulls out which is helpful for my coffee station. Will likely add more storage options to this piece if I’m able to find matching compartments to zip tie against the back panel. So far it’s lovely.
customer_reviews.author: msegs12

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Storage
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 would recommend. We got the microwave oven design. It is very sturdy with adjustable legs heights to account for floor changes. Be advised it will take around 2-3 hours to complete. But it has been super helpful organizing our kitchen and appliances.
customer_reviews.author: WChan

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get some of my pots a pans our from under the counter where they disappear back into the dark. The size was just right. The assembly was straightforward and there were six small hooks which had not shown up in the product photos/description. i went to they hardware store and bought some electrical cable conduit clamps to attach it firmly to the wall where I placed it.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Van Hoy III

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to adjust shelves but it also doesnt require to ...
customer_reviews.text: Holds my pots and pans plus my 900watt microwave. Construction is a little weird. Not easy to adjust shelves but it also doesnt require to take apart to adjust. Overall for the price its a good buy. Wiggles a bit, but feels sturdy once i added weight to it. One shelf was damaged in the box. A little bit of it was bent, but not too big of a deal for me to return.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Moore

customer_reviews.title: Useful shalf
customer_reviews.text: The shalf is easy to ensemble , but when I need to adjust the height of the layers, the top wooden borad already separate with the corner tube stick, needs to improve the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Utility cart is sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Utility cart is sturdy and easy to assemble. The casters are small and plastic, and locking them doesn't do much to prevent the cart from sliding across the floor. The insides of the wire shelf corners that slide over the upright supports appear to be rusty in spots; hopefully that won't affect the strength or durability of the cart. Despite the product description, the top is NOT made of wood - it is MDF with a wood grain decal glued on. The exposed MDF on the underside are not sealed or otherwise protected from moisture. Pretty annoyed by this latter, but overall the cart is functional and not worth the effort to return.
customer_reviews.author: foofoo

customer_reviews.text: I love this! Great for any kitchen. Would recommend. Lost stars for assembly, not hard just didn't know a piece was backwards until last possible try- very frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Seven years and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: One move and two kitchens later and this rack still looks as good as new, is still rock solid and sturdy. The wooden work surface has survived years of coffee spills and hot water overflows (it's been my coffee bar) and is still in perfect condition. The reason for this late review? I just reorganized my kitchen and this rack is a little too big, so I looked for a smaller option. This popped up and then I saw with the message "You purchased this item in 2013". I just ordered the microwave cart; hopefully I can give that a five star review in 2027.
customer_reviews.author: D Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous! Not industrial but great for household use. Looks very nice in my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Its not bad, i believe my set was just bad
customer_reviews.text: Its not bad, i believe my set was just bad. I got metal stuck in my palm when i started taking the parts out of the box. one of the pieces that hold the chip board part was damaged I couldn't really use it. over all it was easy to assemble and it seems sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: A very great item!! It has been so helpful to have this item in our home! It looks great and allows a lot of organization in our home. We were too sure if it would be sturdy because we have the tendency to put so many things on one shelf but it’s been holding up strong for a very long time! It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Lesli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small spaces 👌🏼
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that is small for small spaces like next to my stove it’s a little flimsy but I use it to put a few items when I cook and it works for its purpose:) happy this exists:)
customer_reviews.author: FreeBird

customer_reviews.title: Good deal 8/10
customer_reviews.text: Ok quality. But very good for the price. I, as a professional chef, use this at home and am thrilled with it.
customer_reviews.author: ary dizayee

customer_reviews.title: Very good, comfortable thing
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised. Very good, comfortable thing. And it fits nicely into the interior. Stable. Easy to assemble. I recommend to those who think over the interior design and understand what opportunities this thing has.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: l bought this bakers rack to make more counter space for my small kitchen. It is easy to assemble and comes with good instructions. The wood cutting board is very nice. I use mine to hold a medium sized microwave oven and coffee maker. Its very sturdy and looks nice. The two bottom shelves are great for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bryant

customer_reviews.title: impressed with these boxes, great value very good quality
customer_reviews.text: impressed with these boxes, great value very good quality look awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey for the size.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of storing fairly light weight items. But it's too pricey for the size and durability. It was very easy to put together and like I said before it's serving it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: teaira smith

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I was able to utilize this cart to fix into a wasted space in my kitchen, just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar F.

customer_reviews.title: Not stable.
customer_reviews.text: Moves alot when opening and closing a microwave. Not stable.
customer_reviews.author: E. L.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my small appliances! Very sturdy, went together fast. The wood part is only MDF for those people asking if it’s wood. As for the rest it’s made pretty good for the price. Compact yet holds a lot and the sliding middle shelf is a nice feature
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I am using this in my laundry room to hold laundry detergent. It works great. The bottom of the legs are adjustable (screw in adjuster) to adjust to uneven surfaces to it is stable.
customer_reviews.author: Steff B

customer_reviews.title: Good value, pretty to look at
customer_reviews.text: I love it I love it I love it. It's exactly what I hoped it would be. A bit tricky to put together but once figured out, it was a snap. The Hone-Can-Do Rack is sturdy and the shelves are a good width. Note that there is a shelf on top...I was happily surprised. If I could post a photo I would! Note that it comes with hanging hooks. I didn't know and bought some that I don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to store and transport my 25-pound portable sewing machine ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to store and transport my 25-pound portable sewing machine from closet to dining table, where I sew. My husband hung his entire weight of 170 pounds on the assembled cart, and nothing gave way under his test weight. No more lifting the machine from the closet floor and lugging it to the sewing area. Cart is approx. the same height as the table, so it is an easy slide to set the machine there. Hurray for Honey-Can-Do!!!
customer_reviews.author: Don Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for that useless space in my kitchen in front of a window. I found a great set of stainless steel pots and utensils at Walmart that look terrific on it, too.
customer_reviews.author: MistyWaterWoman

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: this table is not what i expected, especially for the price. it’s a pain to put together and is NOT sturdy at all. it wobbles and moves around and i didn’t feel safe putting my appliances on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chay Josh

customer_reviews.title: Nice cart
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cart. Easy assembly. I have it in my laundry room. Works well
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Image I saw online was actualy bigger buts a bit smaller in reality
customer_reviews.author: mcamrye

customer_reviews.title: Great baker's rack ... takes up little space, gives a lot in return
customer_reviews.text: This baker's rack has turned an unused sliver of space into a major work/storage center. I love it. It fits together fine, taking maybe 30 minutes to assemble. It is durable and rugged, and easy to adjust so it doesn't rock. I zip-tied some Ikea low-voltage "undercounter" lights to the underside of the top shelf, and now I have nice task lighting, too. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay. Deff not worth almost $80. I could have found something better at Ocean State Job Lot. Hard to assemble and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany R. Bates

customer_reviews.title: A Pseudo Kitchen Island of Sorts!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome way to gain some additional countertop space and storage. This may not be the kitchen island you've been dreaming of, but it is a great way to get that 'working triangle' flow, which is enormously helpful when cooking in the kitchen. I found the assembly to be very easy. So far this cart has been through a move, and is still holding up great. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike NYC

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Gosh, this is wobbly. I’m hoping to replace it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!!
customer_reviews.text: How exciting to receive my baker's rack today! How DISAPPOINTING that many parts are missing! I need these shipped to me asap: 2 bushings 4 levelers 6 S-hooks and what is called "4 packaging," which is Part N on the assembly/parts list.
customer_reviews.author: Tarheel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I loved my new duplex, everything except the small kitchen until I ordered this bakers rack. Now I am in love with my small kitchen. It was very affordable and easy to put together. It not only helped with extra kitchen storage but it looks nice too!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great for on a budget
customer_reviews.text: It’s very nice in my kitchen only complaints are it was almost impossible to get the shelves level and the spice rack at the top had a bar that was not connected on the ends so it’s very easily bent
customer_reviews.author: sharon croarkin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This cart is exactly what I was looking for! I had tried to make my own (bought the wire shelving, a cutting board, and casters) but it just didn't work quite right and was a little smaller than I wanted. So, I finally decided to just buy this one and I'm so happy I did. It's sturdy and rolls easily and looks good in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: The cart was easy to assemble and is just the right size for ...
customer_reviews.text: The cart was easy to assemble and is just the right size for my 15 inch flat screen kitchen television. There is plenty of space on the shelves for tissues, a small radio, a recipe box and a fake plant on the bottom. The wheels roll well and the cart is sturdy enough for these lightweight items.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Shaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Lower the TOP.
customer_reviews.text: Cart would have 5 stars if the height Of THE Top Had Been Lower OR adjustable. I contacted the company to find out if the posts could be purchased in shorter length and they said no other options were available. Today, I took a skill saw and shortened the verticles by 3 &1/2 inches. We now have a perfect cart for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in a RV park model kitchen at end of the sink island
customer_reviews.text: Purpose: We needed an extension on the sink island in our park model RV, to put the clean dish rack on . This is perfect. The bottom shelf holds out Golden retriever's food and water dishes. The top "spice" shelf holds a plant. Very nice addition to our RV kitchen/Living room area.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Vaillancourt

customer_reviews.title: Terrible rack
customer_reviews.text: I give it 1 star. Instructions suck, then when finally figured out how to put together the parts didn't fit properly so rack is very flimsy. Am going to use pop rivets to strengthen the rack. Will keep because I could never get it back in the box to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy microwave stand!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Adjustable feet. Feels sturdy. Works perfectly in daughter’s first apartment.
customer_reviews.author: K2 Pro

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and practical.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Ninja Foodi. I can cook right where it is a lot easier than having to move it every time I used it. I got a small microwave that I put on the 2nd shelf and now my countertop is clear.. The bottom shelf pulls out. I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jill T.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in the space it needed it to. I was worried about the sturdiness but it’s been about 3 months and it’s still holding up. Pretty easy to put together. I watched a video on YouTube to do it because the instructions it came with looked confusing at a point
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Well Made - Sturdy - Easy to Roll Around
customer_reviews.text: Well Made - Sturdy - Easy to Roll Around The wooden Top makes it very useful. The big wheels are Durable and easy to move unlike those smaller wheels on some carts, these are well suited for the cart even if moving around heavy objects.
customer_reviews.author: Concierge2000@710

customer_reviews.title: Recommended, especially for small living spaces
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit wobbly, but definitely sturdy enough for me to hang pots from and sit things on the top rack. I have a microwave and other items sitting on the two racks underneath the counter part. I use the counter part to store a food steamer/rice cooker and as a surface for my cutting board. This greatly adds to the space and utility of the kitchen portion of my small studio apartment. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: W. J. V.

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy to put together, and attractive
customer_reviews.text: I have several products from Honey Can Do and will gladly add to my collection from now on. The shelves are wider than they look in the picture which is good. You do need an electric drill or screw driver for the wooden part. I used a battery operated drill on low power and there was no damage. Other than that this this is a cinch to build. It has a great airly look to it and will fit into most decor.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P. Surrey

customer_reviews.title: Great little bakers rack
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for a small workstation for my wood carving and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: murk1

customer_reviews.title: Some parts do not fit together
customer_reviews.text: I have several shelves of this style pole and shelf shelving and they all went together just fine. But this item uses lighter metal than others and some of the holes are bent so that the poles with the plastic inserts do not fit into them. Much bending and pounding is required. Also, the top does not fit tight and I had to add screws to stabilize it. I am using it as a shop table, so these problems are OK. I would not use it in my kitchen, though. It got too beat-up in the process of assembling it.
customer_reviews.author: JohnL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for art studio
customer_reviews.text: I use this in an art studio for extra shelving and cutting surface for art work. Since I am not too mechanically inclined, I was a little worried about putting it together, but it was simple. It is sturdy and versatile. I use the bottom shelves to store paper flat, for baskets holding art tools, hooks for hanging items and the top rack for odd shaped items that won't fit in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for what I needed. I was unsure about the height due to it being a tight area anyway. But I'm glad I went with it or I feel it would have looked even more displaced than it already does. I love the top shelf to have something decorative. I assembled it a little differently. To fit my wants and needs. Awesome for customizing shelf height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken shelf.
customer_reviews.text: The top shelf (the wooden one) came damaged. A chink of the wood was missing. We put it at the back, and you cant see it, but it's an inferior product, and I would not have purchased if I knew this was a risk.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate description. The board is NOT solid wood. Cheap particle board.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: solid rack!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my rack to store my tons of kitchen equipment. I am a professional chef, but I live in a very small apartment so my countertops were beyond cluttered, between oils, vinegars etc, and kitchen equipment. So I bought this rack to clear my counters. It has worked wonders, and looks great. It is very sturdy once you adjust the feet on the bottom for your floor. I would have given it 5 stars, but the top rack was bent right at the down tube, almost to a ninety degree angle. I didnt want to repackage and send the whole thing back for one piece, so I heated it up, and bent it back myself. ,
customer_reviews.author: troy Milton

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Particle board shelf..NOT WOOD... diameter of upright poles less than the usual for this type of shelving...wobbles..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not super stable but does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not the most stable thing in the world but it does the job as far as holding a microwave amd utensils. Had hoped to use it as extra counter space to chop, etc. but isn't stable enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the size
customer_reviews.text: It worked great it fit the spot I had and it's sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Rapp

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, minimalistic shelf and counter piece that really classed up my kitchen. We put the microwave and coffee maker on the counter, while putting our pots and casserole dishes on the racks underneath. The top rack is where we've put our spices and coffee stuff. We've hung our pots and pot holders on hooks. We have more room now than what we had before with an overhead cabinet and microwave cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item. It is just what I needed in the kitchen and I had to get a second one to use as a stand up desk for my computer. I'm under five feet in height so it is just the right proportion to use for this purpose. It is very easy to assemble and is very sturdy and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: nice cart
customer_reviews.text: I did not put this together as in the photo. Didn't like the casters, too big and it made the cart too high considering I am short and wanted to use this as counter space. I omitted the wheels since it will be stationary anyway. I also omitted the handle bar as without it the cart fits perfectly in the designated space. Nice looking addition to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: The Baker's rack is great for a 1 bedroom apartment with limited kitchen space
customer_reviews.text: The Baker's rack is great for a 1 bedroom apartment with limited kitchen space. It's easy to put together and is sturdy once put put some weight on the bottom rack. The sliding shelve is great. My only gripe as of right now is that the packaging came slightly damage and the laminate on the manufactured wood came peeling off. The wood sqeaks a little when I put pressure on it but I'm hoping it goes away after its been able to breathe a little after opening from the package
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but arrived slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Arrived slightly damaged- wood was peeling on some corners, one of the bars was slightly bent. Some parts weren’t labeled. Otherwise seems fine and pretty sturdy. Looks good in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Got it earlier than promised in excellent condition. Product was exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Got it earlier than promised in excellent condition. Product was exactly as described. Easy assembly, high quality. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Really like this mini bakers rack
customer_reviews.text: Really like this mini bakers rack. It fits perfectly in my kitchen, i use it for the microwave and we put our fresh fruit on the top rack. The butcher block shelf is just about abot the same height as my counters which creates a nice flow in my kitchen. I only wish it was a tad bit sturdier when we open and close the microwave it moves slightly.
customer_reviews.author: SanJose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, perfect cart to have out in view. At the moment we use it as a bar cart; when guests are over for dinner I see we'll be able to use it as a food server, an extension of our dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, useful, fabulous price
customer_reviews.text: This was a fabulous find. It fits perfectly in my 1800s kitchen, giving me the added counter space I needed. I use it to wheel appliances around and also as a food prep center. It is very sturdy and well-built -- an exceptional buy for the price. My handy hubby put it together in less than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Becky D Mc

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.  Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a place to hang pots and pans. I did quite a bit of searching before deciding on this one. I needed to make sure it would hold multiple pots and pans. It DOES! Also, it was pretty easy to assemble. I wish it had a bit more fashion to go with it's function but really, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika P.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my husband and I have a one bedroom apartment with a small kitchen. I like to cook a lot, so that did not really work out! I had no idea what I was going to do with everything, and I am so glad I ordered this! It holds a ton of stuff! It was relatively easy to put together, the instructions are useless. Luckily it is self explanatory....except for the black plastic things that go over the metal legs to hold the shelves up, those can be put on the wrong way so be sure to pay attention to that! This was a really good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KelsiT

customer_reviews.title: Love it! A little wobbly but we have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! A little wobbly but we have to bolt it to the wall anyway because of having two toddler boys. Just wish I could find the same rack with extra shelves that's a tad bit taller. But for now this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kat S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy , quality bakers rack.
customer_reviews.text: Love how this looks in my galley kitchen and it adds extra counter space. Went together quickly. Sturdy for prep work.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Ketchum

customer_reviews.title: cart for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cart to give my mom some extra space in her small kitchen. She has recently moved into an assisted living facility and that was quite a downsizing for her. With this cart she can easily pull it into the kitchen and do her thing. It rolls easily and is VERY sturdy. I wish I had a need for it as it is super looking and so useful.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Great company with awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: There was a defect in the wood when mine came, but Michelle from customer service fixed everything. Great bakers rack for the kitchen! I would say the counter space is too narrow and the storage space too eventually crowded to serve as a useful prep space, but it works phenomenally for storage. Great company with awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Ato

customer_reviews.title: Great for coffee/tea station
customer_reviews.text: Great baker's rack! We have set it up as a coffee/tea station. It is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it was to put together. I love how it is strong enough to hold my little microwave on the middle shelf. I have a small kitchen, and I love how easy it is to move the cart out of the way when needed. It looks better than I expected. I get compliments on it all the time. Very very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jillan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to extend the space in my kitchen. It was easy to install. Light enough to be moved around. I have a dehydrator that is 36 inches wide, and it fits very well on the middle shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Adela

customer_reviews.title: Great and Sturdy Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piece! It has added loads of storage in my kitchen. I hang my spoons, spatulas, measuring cups, cutting boars, and pans on this rack. It is a great temporary fix until I get my kitchen done in a few years. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just plain JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Lets start with wobbly! Microwave shelf is just butcher block contact paper over what appears to be cheap pressed wood. AMAZON how about doing some Q.C. This is going back or in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quickly and easily. I highly recommend it especially for use in ...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly as advertised and was just what I needed in my kitchen. I usually need help to assembly everything, but I put this together by myself, quickly and easily. I highly recommend it especially for use in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Honey-Can-Do SHF-04347 Microwave Bakers Rack with Adjustable Shelf, Chrome, 17L x 23W x 59H
product_meta.description: Style Name:3-Shelf Microwave Bakers RackHoney-Can-Do SHF-04347 Bakers Rack With Storage, Chrome and Wood Cutting Board. Brilliant chrome finish and contemporary design makes this unit the perfect blend of good looks and functionality. Its sturdy, commercial quality frame has two thick grid-style, adjustable wire shelves (lower withstands 200 lbs.), a solid maple cutting surface, and a bonus top rail for spices. Features an easy no tool assembly, open wire design for easy cleaning, and leg levelers for use on uneven floors. Instantly create additional space and organization to your kitchen.
feature_bullets: Features solid maple cutting surface and bonus rail for holding spices
Sturdy steel construction for long term reliability
No-tool assembly allows you to construct in minutes
Fully adjustable shelving allows for easy configuration for your custom project
Measures: 17.72 in L x 23.62 in W x 59.06 in H45 cml x60 cmw x150 cmh

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars655 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Mini Bakers Rack with Wood Cutting Board
